description:
The World's Fastest Image Viewer

Experience the next generation of image viewing. Blazing-fast loading speeds, ultra-low memory usage, and powerful built-in tools â€” all in one lightweight app. Easily find photos by date taken, batch convert HEIC to JPEG, and add thumbnails for HEIC, SVG & PSD in Windows Explorer. Enhance your experience with powerful real-time visual effects.
100% free for personal and commercial use.
No ads. No bloat. Just pure speed.

Version 1.5 ( 2503 ) - May 21, 2025

- New feature: Added thumbnail support for HEIC, SVG, PSD, and TGA in Windows Explorer.
- Added an option to permanently delete files (Do not move to Recycle Bin).
- Added support for HEIC and Adobe DNG when searching photos by date taken.
- Added a fullscreen option for double-click behavior.
- Fixed a bug where images couldn't be opened due to long file paths.
- Fixed a startup lag caused by image preloading.
- Fixed a bug that caused some SVG files to fail to load.
- Added Polish translation.
